LanguageData.Apparel_PolarisShieldBelt_II.label: polaris - II shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_PolarisShieldBelt_II.description: The publicly available version of the Polaris shield belt has limited performance. The improved energy radiation method enables the wearer to use the gun to attack externally and provide protection when attacked at close quarters.
LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer.label: lyrae curer
LanguageData.PolarisLyraeCurer.description: The lyrae curer will tend wounds to nearby creatures but the quality won't be good.
LanguageData.PolarisShipReactor.label: Machinoid ship reactor
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat.label: thermostat
LanguageData.PolarisThermostat.description: A device that can control the temperature near the target value.
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf.label: mending shelf
LanguageData.PolarisMendingShelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this won't deteriorate, even if outside. In addition, the items will be mended if it has fuel.
LanguageData.PolarisCartridge.label: cartridge
LanguageData.PolarisCartridge.description: The cartridge can be worn by a pawn and protects the wearer from a certain death. The wearer will be resurrected immediatly upon death. Administered to a corpse, the cartridge will repair and kickstart the body back to life.\n\nSo, is life equal? Is it really good to exchange one's life for another person's life?
LanguageData.PolarisBondorudoDiary.label: Bondorudo's diary
LanguageData.PolarisWhiteFlute.label: white flute
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip.label: combat chip
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChip.description: A universal tactical chip that have the ability to enhance any aspects of the user. Using a converter will activate the tactical chip and also change its mode.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChipConverter.label: converter
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChipConverter.description: A tactical chip converter to convert one's tactical chip installed in someone's head. The converter will activate and convert the chip mode to the one recorded in the converter. It is reusable.
LanguageData.PolarisCombatChipConverter.verbs.0.label: use converter
LanguageData.PolarisHealingPotion.label: potent healing potion
LanguageData.PolarisHealingPotion.description: A quick recovery and healing potion that automatically heals wounds. The effect of this potion are very powerful.
LanguageData.PolarisAntibiotic.label: combined antibiotic
LanguageData.PolarisAntibiotic.description: A combination of multiple antibiotics that can cure most common diseases.
LanguageData.PolarisReceptorAntagonist.label: receptor antagonist
LanguageData.PolarisReceptorAntagonist.description: The receptor antagonist is a drug that blocks drugs needs by binding to and blocking any drugs receptor rather than activating it like an agonist. So this drug will satisfy chemical needs, and ease the drug addiction at the same time.
LanguageData.PolarisRestorer.label: polaris restorer
LanguageData.PolarisRestorer.description: Mysterious drugs from the Polarisbloc that can free you from all sorts of bad situations.
LanguageData.PolarisProj_HealingPotion.label: potent healing potion
LanguageData.PolarisGas_Healing.label: healing smoke
LanguageData.Polaris_HealingPotionBelt.label: healing potion belt
LanguageData.Polaris_HealingPotionBelt.description: A nomal belt boned some healing potions, let you could to throw the bottle to make a lot of healing smoking pop to heal people.
LanguageData.Polaris_HealingPotionBelt.verbs.0.label: throw healing potion
LanguageData.PolarisVirtualNetChip.label: virtual net chip
LanguageData.PolarisVirtualNetChip.description: A chip connected to a Virtual Network that can be used for entertainment whenever needed. Moreover, it will calm down the user if they ever have a mental breakdown.
LanguageData.PolarisPsionwire.label: psionwire
LanguageData.PolarisPsionwire.description: A chip capable of stimulating psionic abilities. Using this chip can enhance biological consciousness and fire resistance.
LanguageData.PolarisPsychicBerserkPulser.label: psychic berserk pulser
LanguageData.PolarisPsychicBerserkPulser.description: A one-use artifact that generate a strong psychic pulse that make all human go berserk (not included colonists).
LanguageData.PolarisOrbitalTraderCaller.label: orbital trader caller
LanguageData.PolarisOrbitalTraderCaller.description: It will launch a broadcast containing coordinate information and will direct the specified nearest orbital trader to the origin of the broadcast.
LanguageData.PolarisMechSerumTraitreleaser.label: traitreleaser
LanguageData.PolarisMechSerumTraitreleaser.descriptio: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to gain a specific trait. The subject choose to get the recorded trait or remove a trait from them. By removing a trait, the mechanites will record it and replace the pre-existing trait. However, this feature is only feasible 3 times.
LanguageData.PolarisMechSerumTraitreleaser.comps.0.us: Use traitreleaser mech serum to get {0}
LanguageData.PolarisMomeryRester.label: momery rester
LanguageData.PolarisMomeryRester.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to change the subject's backstory into the recorded ones.
LanguageData.PolarisDevilCookie.label: devil cookie
LanguageData.PolarisDevilCookie.description:
Would you bargain with the devil just because you are hungry?

This is a mysterious cookie and no one knows how it appeared in the world. And it will not vanish even once eaten.

According to the records of the researcher from Polarisbloc, this cookie will take some life force from who ate it. Maybe this was the reason why it could feed the hunger fully.

--<No.666 file of Polarisbloc> #public version
LanguageData.PolarisVoidKey.label: void key
LanguageData.PolarisVoidKey.description:
Project.193

At first, we made something that can link the soul of the dead, although the dead one must be in our knowledge.
And then we thought, why can't we resurrect the lost soul?
We tried to use the Proj.013"cartridge" to do this, but it failed.
Some additional attemps were made but all failed, even when we used living subjects. All of them couldn't provide the life force and power needed to resurrect the lost soul.
Finally, we had no choice but to use the Philosopher's stone to get our colleague back (although he was a little bit unconscious).

--<No.193 file of Polarisbloc> #public version
LanguageData.PolarisDecoder.label: biocode decoder
LanguageData.PolarisDecoder.description: A decoder to decode the biocode in the special weapon.\nIt has a chance to change the biocode depends on the user's Intellectual level and the item quality.\nThere is a chance that the recoder will destroy after used. Other, if a weapon could be coded, this decoder will also could code the biocode and never destroy.
LanguageData.VanyaDataCenter.label: data center
